fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visited the visitor must roll 16 d6's
If more than 10 are either a 1, 2 or 3 add a token to your counter.
You start with 2 tokens and cannot gain over 2. You loose 1 every time 2 people die at night.
When you have 0 tokens you breach and must attack someone every night with a None strengh attack
If you are attacked while breached you will deal an attack with one level higher than their current defense. This attack can neither be protected from, nor stopped by any means possible.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have punishing bird free to reign in the town(Breach punishing bird)
